availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Urey Henry (Lyon County, Kentucky, retail dealer)

body.p: Lyon County, Kentucky, retail dealer. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Gracey Henry in Lyon County in December 1863. Retail dealer in Lyon County in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Internal Revenue Assessment Lists for Kentucky, 1862-1866_ NARA RG 58, Microfilm Series M768, Roll 17, Lyon County, Kentucky, 1864.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Caldwell County Marriages, Film #000546374, p. 85
"Urey Henry (1842-1867)," Find A Grave, Memorial #67145005, accessed July 18, 2019, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/67145005.
